scripts.release:check: git diff --exit-code || (echo 'Uncommitted changes found. Please commit or stash them before running the release.' && exit 1)
scripts.release:branch-check: branch=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD) && [[ "$branch" == "master" || "$branch" == "develop" ]] || (echo 'Releases are only allowed on master or develop branches.' && exit 1)
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:check && npm run release:branch-check && standard-version --release-as patch && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): bump version to $(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")' && git push --follow-tags origin $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:check && npm run release:branch-check && standard-version --release-as minor && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): bump version to $(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")' && git push --follow-tags origin $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)
scripts.release:major: npm run release:check && npm run release:branch-check && standard-version --release-as major && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): bump version to $(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")' && git push --follow-tags origin $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)
scripts.commit-push: npm run release:check && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: save work in progress' && git push origin $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)
